   16: 
   17: -module(frontier_SUITE).
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -import(ct_helper, [doc/1]).
   21: 
   22: all() -> 
   23: 	[push_url].
   24: 
   25: init_per_suite(_Config) ->
   26: 	[].
   27: 
   28: push_url(_Config)->
   29: 	doc("Pushes diffrent URLs to frontier queue"),
   30: 	ok=frontier:push_url("http://blog.gregormeyenberg.de"),
   31: 	url_exists=frontier:push_url("http://blog.gregormeyenberg.de"),
   32: 	invalid_url=frontier:push_url("jjjjo/eee"),
   33: 	invalid_file_type=frontier:push_url("http://blog.gregormeyenberg.de/public/style.css?version=sss.html").
